import React, { useState , useEffect } from 'react'; import './CSS/admin.css'; import Login from './login'; function Admin() { const [IsSignIn, setIsSignIn] = useState(false); const [User, setUser] = useState(""); const [Email, setEmail] = useState(""); var [date,setDate] = useState(new Date()); const OnPageLoad = () => { fetch('http://localhost:8000/users') .then(response => response.json()) .then(response => { console.log(response) var txt = "" var i ="" for (i = 0; i < response.length; i++) { txt += "" txt += "" + JSON.stringify(response[i].id) + ""; txt += "" + JSON.stringify(response[i].name) + ""; txt += "" + JSON.stringify(response[i].email) + ""; txt += "" + JSON.stringify(response[i].joined) + ""; txt += "" } document.getElementById('users').innerHTML=txt; }) } useEffect(() => { var timer = setInterval(()=>setDate(new Date()), 1000 ) return function cleanup() { clearInterval(timer) } }); return ( <> {IsSignIn ? ( <>








Welcome, Admin Today is {date.toLocaleString()}

) : (
)} ) }; export default Admin;
